long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Composing War and Peace-length instructional e-mails? Not in 2020.

screenROCK lets you create on-the-fly screen recordings directly from your browser - you can even annotate the screen as you talk, with lines, shapes and text. When you're done, sharing your masterpiece is a breeze.

Oh, and it's totally free.
